page.title: 19CLOTHES AND FASHIONS
page.content: The clothes of today are very different from what our parents used to wear. People are now far more fashion conscious than they used to be and people tend to associate with one trend or another. The following is a list of styles that young people in our local area are wearing today;mods, casuals, rockers, punks and futurists. Mods began in the 1950's but there are still many people who follow this fashion and ride scooters (the standard Mod form of transport). Casuals wear modern designer clothes that are very expensive to buy and which come in and out of fashion very quickly. These clothes are easily identified by the makers emblem or label that is clearly visible on shirts,jumpers and trousers.
